remarks: Cancellation law: if the values of two trace-preserving endormorphisms are equal, so are the endormorphisms.  Lemma J of [Crawley] p. 118. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendocan.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendocan.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendocan.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendocan.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendocan $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E /\ ( U ` F ) = ( V ` F ) ) /\ ( F e. T /\ F =/= ( _I |` B ) ) ) -> U = V ) $.
